name: Loonar Studios
tagline: Mobile and web design and development solutions
description:
Loonar Studios is an innovative and creative team which combines design, engineering and strategy to build stable and successful world-class solutions. We know that unique and quality user interface is a key to your customers’ heart. Fast performance and great user experience will give your website a new push up to the top. We are able to craft your ideas into something beautiful.
We will work closely with you to handle all aspects of project development such as designing, wireframing, prototyping, testing, app release and marketing. We offer services at all stages of the entire development cycle.
Our primary specialization is the following:
DESIGN:
• web design
• mobile app design
• e-commerce design
• branding design
• 3D modelling
• custom illustrations
WEB DEVELOPMENT:
• websites and landing pages
• e-commerces and marketplaces
• ERP systems
• SaaS applications
MOBILE DEVELOPMENT:
• native mobile development
• cross-platform development
